quote_first: Kuniang made her appearance in my study
quote_last: , arrayed in what had once been a “party frock.”
title: The Maker of Heavenly Trousers
author: Daniel Vare

quote_last: . My hot water bottle was ready, and I filled a glass with water from the tap. Time was of the essence.
title: The Thirteenth Tale
author: Diane Setterfield
